front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Interface of New Gas-Insulated Equipment in Existing Gas-Insulated Substations Rated Above 52kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Recommendations for the connection of gas-insulated substation to another gas insulated substation of a different make are given. This document IEEE PC37.122.6TM is replacing the document IEEE Std 1416 TM
